title: Need Some Space? Huge 1x1+Den ~ Latitude Apartments
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please see our available tour times and book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7:
This top-floor apartment has it all.

The apartment features a den space perfect for working from home, spacious U-shaped kitchen with plenty of cabinets, a private balcony space, and a bright living room with large windows which look out to the East with Space Needle Views.
Sandwiched right in-between the city and the water,
in Lower Queen Anne offer you the joys and convenience of city and nature.
The perfect blend of what the Pacific Northwest is so well known for.
Living at Latitude you can enjoy a multitude of restaurants, night life, and shopping or you can soak up your surroundings at Myrtle Edwards Park and on the Elliot Bay Trail.
Walking distance to Safeway, Metropolitan Market and major bus routes and the Space Needle.
This building offers you everything you
And inside we offer so much more!
-Community room and Kitchen with free Direct TV and Wi-Fi
For photos, floorplans and more info visit latitudequeenanne[dot]com
Self-book a tour with us through Knock Rentals!
Don't worry, this won't sign you up for any services.
Photos may be of similar units at Latitude Apartments.
*Photos are representational of finishes and features, not of exact unit.
**We do business in accordance with the Federal Fair Housing Law.
